text: Jack Michael McMullen (born 22 February 1991) is an English actor and writer. He is best known for portraying the roles of Josh McLoughlin in the Channel 4 soap opera Brookside (2002–2003), Timothy "Tigger" Johnson in the BBC children's drama series Grange Hill (2004–2008), and Finn Sharkey in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2010–2012). ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:English writers Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Writers from Liverpool
title: Jack McMullen
